t1.name: Silver Deben
t1.description: An ancient Egyptian silver coin used by merchants for trade along the Nile.

t2.name: Papyrus Scroll
t2.description: A merchant's record scroll detailing trade routes and precious cargo manifests.

t3.name: Ivory Comb
t3.description: An intricately carved ivory comb, a luxury item traded from distant lands.

t4.name: Ceramic Oil Lamp
t4.description: A simple yet elegant oil lamp used to light the merchant's quarters.

t5.name: Golden Bracelet
t5.description: An ornate golden bracelet adorned with precious stones, worn by Egyptian nobility.

t6.name: Ceremonial Dagger
t6.description: A ritual dagger with a jeweled handle, used in noble ceremonies.

t7.name: Jade Scarab
t7.description: A protective jade scarab amulet, symbol of rebirth and eternal life.

t8.name: Alabaster Canopic Jar
t8.description: An elegant alabaster jar used to store precious oils and perfumes.

t9.name: Ebony Walking Stick
t9.description: A polished ebony walking stick topped with a golden ankh symbol.

t10.name: Lapis Lazuli Necklace
t10.description: A stunning necklace made from rare lapis lazuli stones, prized by the wealthy.

t11.name: Sacred Ankh
t11.description: A golden ankh symbol representing eternal life, blessed by the temple priests.

t12.name: Copper Mirror
t12.description: A polished copper mirror used for ritual purification ceremonies.

t13.name: Incense Burner
t13.description: An ornate bronze incense burner used in temple worship rituals.

t14.name: Ritual Chalice
t14.description: A sacred silver chalice used for libation offerings to the gods.

t15.name: Ceremonial Fan
t15.description: An ornate feathered fan used by priests during temple ceremonies.

t16.name: Prayer Beads
t16.description: A string of blessed prayer beads used for meditation and worship.

t17.name: Holy Water Vessel
t17.description: A vessel containing blessed water from the sacred temple well.

t18.name: Temple Bell
t18.description: A bronze bell used to call the faithful to prayer and announce ceremonies.

t19.name: Pharaoh's Seal
t19.description: An ancient royal seal bearing the cartouche of a forgotten pharaoh.

t20.name: Crystal Orb
t20.description: A mystical crystal orb said to reveal visions of the past and future.

t21.name: Hieroglyphic Tablet
t21.description: An ancient stone tablet inscribed with mysterious hieroglyphic prophecies.

t22.name: Golden Scepter
t22.description: A magnificent golden scepter topped with the eye of Horus.

t23.name: Obsidian Knife
t23.description: A razor-sharp obsidian ceremonial knife used in ancient rituals.

t24.name: Meteorite Fragment
t24.description: A piece of sacred meteorite believed to contain divine power.

t25.name: Ancient Compass
t25.description: A mystical navigation device that always points toward hidden treasures.

t26.name: Time Crystal
t26.description: A legendary crystal that glows with the power of ages past.

t27.name: Ritual Mask
t27.description: An ornate golden mask worn by high priests during sacred ceremonies.

t28.name: Eternal Flame Torch
t28.description: A torch that burns with an eternal flame, never extinguished since ancient times.

t29.name: Crown of Ra
t29.description: The legendary crown of the sun god Ra, radiating divine light and power.

t30.name: Staff of Thoth
t30.description: The wisdom staff of Thoth, god of knowledge, containing all ancient secrets.

t31.name: Feather of Ma'at
t31.description: The sacred feather of Ma'at, goddess of truth, used to weigh souls in the afterlife.

t32.name: Tears of Isis
t32.description: Crystallized tears of the goddess Isis, said to grant eternal protection.

t33.name: Heart of Osiris
t33.description: The preserved heart of Osiris, lord of the underworld, pulsing with life force.

t34.name: Eye of Horus Amulet
t34.description: The ultimate protective amulet containing the complete power of Horus.

t35.name: Serpent of Apep
t35.description: A bound fragment of the chaos serpent Apep, contained within a sacred vessel.

t36.name: Breath of Shu
t36.description: A vial containing the breath of Shu, god of air, granting power over the winds.

t37.name: Scale of Sobek
t37.description: A single scale from the crocodile god Sobek, providing protection in water.

t38.name: Anubis Guardian Statue
t38.description: A miniature statue of Anubis that comes alive to guard its owner's treasures.

t39.name: Book of the Dead
t39.description: The complete Book of the Dead, containing all spells needed for the afterlife journey.

t40.name: Pyramid Capstone
t40.description: The golden capstone of the Great Pyramid, containing the concentrated power of all pharaohs.

descriptions.starter: Ancient map fragment to the Forgotten Merchant's Cache.
descriptions.junior: Explorer's map piece to the Noble's Hidden Vault.
descriptions.expert: Master cartographer's map to the High Priest's Treasury.
descriptions.master: Legendary map fragment to the Pharaoh's Secret Hoard.
descriptions.wizard: Divine map piece to the Vault of the Gods.
